column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we were finally seated
column2: we received our salads and then pizza. Service was quick and nice. The salad wasn't bad
column3: the dressing was yummy. Finally...the pizza arrived and we couldn't wait to dig in. We thought the first bite was nothing to write home about and kept eating
column4: hoping to taste the what made this place so amazing for others. While we did enjoy the crust
column5: the cheese and sauce was seriously lacking. The sauce I think was the worst
